summary: The Dragonborn’s Razor is a set of distinctive and beautiful, but very deadly weapons (Dagger, Sword and Great Sword) with a very high attack speed, which does very high damage per second. It is craftable and upgradable as a physical weapon. They are also a bound magical weapons that can be summoned with a conjuration spell.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][b][b][b][b][color=#00ffff][b]This mod is also available for [u]Skyrim Special Edition[/u], which can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11911?][u]here[/u][/url].[/b][/color][b]
[/b][/b][/b][/b]

The Dragonborn’s Razor Weapons[/b][/color]

It is a set of distinctive, very beautiful, but very deadly weapons. Now it includes a [b][u]Dagger[/u], [u]Sword[/u][/b] and [u][b]Great Sword[/b][/u], all based on the Mehrunes model.

The weapons have very high attack speed which gives it a higher damage output per second than other type of one-handed weapons.

This mod allows you to [u]craft and use[/u] them as a [u][b]normal physical weapons[/b][/u], but they are also available as a [u][b]summonable bound weapons[/b][/u] (conjuration magic) item.

This means that wherever you are in the game you can summon this awesome weapon to you instantly (certain missions and when you are in prison you are stripped of all items). Now you can summon these awesome weapon to you whenever you need. Sheathe the weapon to dispel it. The spell lasts for five minutes and you can re-summon it whenever you need.

The Weapons will add a perk which provides you with a 5% chance to instantly kill an opponent (even dragons), no matter how much health the target has, as well as two weapon enchantments, which boosts your Magika regeneration rate and which absorbs health from the target.

[color=#ffff00]
[/color][color=#ffff00][b]What this mod does?[/b][/color]

This mod will allow you to craft the following awesome items:

- Dragonborn’s Razor Dagger----------------------(A very beautiful, and very deadly, upgradable dagger with awesome enchanted effects)
- Dragonborn’s Razor Sword-----------------------(A very beautiful, and very deadly, upgradable dagger with awesome enchanted effects)
- Dragonborn’s Razor Great Sword----------------(A very beautiful, and very deadly, upgradable dagger with awesome enchanted effects)
- Spell: Bound Dragonborn’s Razor Dagger-------(Summon the Dragonborn’s Razor Dagger as a bound magical weapon)
- Spell: Bound Dragonborn’s Razor Sword--------(Summon the Dragonborn’s Razor Dagger as a bound magical weapon)
- Spelltomes: Dragonborn’s Razor Weapons-----(Craft the spell-tomes which will add the Dragonborn’s Razor spell)
[b]

[color=#ffff00]
Possible CTD Issue when using Summon Bound Dragonborn’s Razor spell -  Issue & Fix[/color][/b]

Should you experience a CTD (Crash to Desktop) issue when you use the summon the Dragonborn’s Razor - please take note of the following:

1) It is [u][b]not due to this mod[/b][/u] - it is a common bug related to the game - summon bound sword issue.
2) Easy fix is to dump all your gear into a container. Save the game.
3) Zoom out on your character. Open the console by pressing the tilde (`) key.
4) Click on you character. Should see a number similar to "(00000014)".
5) Type "resetinventory". Press enter. Save. Restart the game. Gear up. Problem solved.


[color=#ffff00]
[b]Compatibility[/b][/color]

This standalone mod adds new weapons, spells, crafting- and improving recipes to the game & should be compatible with most other mods.
